snippet: Mayor Rahm Emanuel of Chicago said Thursday that he would ask a federal judge who declared the city’s ban on firearms sales unconstitutional to give lawmakers six months to adopt a new ordinance regulating gun shops.
abstract: Chicago Mayor Rahm Emanuel says he will ask federal Judge Edmond E Chang, who declared the city’s ban on firearms sales unconstitutional, to give lawmakers six months to adopt a new ordinance regulating gun shops.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Rahm Emanuel of Chicago said Thursday that he would ask a federal judge who declared the city’s ban on firearms sales unconstitutional to give lawmakers six months to adopt a new ordinance regulating gun shops.

headline.main: Illinois: Chicago Wants Six Months to Revise Rules on Gun Sales
